name: Bar Sting
description:
I made this project for my college assignment.

This is one of my favorite place, Bar Sting in Seoul, Korea.

You can drink, drunk, and get killed by bartender.

Nothing personal, just for fun XD.

Short game, I'm glad if you laugh.

Thank you.

* Move : W, A, S, D and mouse

*Sit : F

*Drink : G

*Order : O
